Title: Hussmann Unveils New Reach-In Merchandiser with Air-Cooled Microblock™ Technology
Summary: Hussmann, a Panasonic company, has launched its newest merchandiser complete with Microblock™ Technology. The RLN-A and RMN-A offer refrigerated retail solutions for both medium and low temperature applications. The display case features an all-in-one, top-mounted refrigeration system to simplify the installation and service process.
